summary.span: 定義方法，用於將標記的 組件新增至 XPS 套件。

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of the markup to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝，請參閱中的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000)。For more information about the element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).
